title: Lex Writing Platform Gains 25,000 Users in 24 Hours with Claude AI | Anthropic Case Study \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Lex Writing Platform Gains 25,000 Users in 24 Hours with Claude AI | Anthropic Case Study \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Discover how Lex used Anthropic's Claude AI to revolutionize their writing platform, gaining 25,000 new users in 24 hours, reducing monthly churn by 20-30%, and cutting costs by 50%. Learn about AI-powered writing assistance and its impact on user productivity and confidence.
